duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute an effective, comprehensive internal audit plan based on a risk assessment process.
Help oversee and support risk assessments of Bank processes and the evaluation of risks impacting the Bank based on Firmwide inter-dependencies.
Support the development of quarterly Bank Audit Committee materials and responses to regulatory requests impacting the U.S. Banks.
Identify and assess areas of critical and high risks, including the evaluation of the U.S. Banks' risk profiles and emerging risks.
Maintain effective working relationships with business units and internally within the Internal Audit Department, including business and functional support teams.
Participate in discussions with stakeholders on Bank topics/matters and provide valuable insights on risks impacting the Banks.
Foster focus on high-quality assurance to ensure compliance with U.S. Bank specific policies, procedures, and processes based on applicable regulatory and industry guidance.
Develop clear messaging of risks and controls to the Bank stakeholders, including Senior Management & Committees, Regulators, and Audit Committee.

education_certification.credential: College degree (or equivalent) required, CPA and/or Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) a plus
